product_name: Arc'teryx Theta SV Bib Shell Pants - Women's
long_description: Arc'teryx Theta SV women's bib shell pants thrive and protect in harsh weather. They're crafted from robust GORE-TEX(R) Pro shell fabric for high-performance protection and durability. Waterproof, windproof and breathable, GORE-TEX Pro offers exceptional durability and full weather protection in a supple, notably soft-to-the-touch fabric. Gore micro-grid backer slides easily over mid layers. Reinforced in the knees, lower legs and seat to protect high-wear areas. Micro-seam allowances and tiny Gore(R) seam tape reduce bulkiness and weight. Bib helps keep out snow, yet is low cut for core breathability; rear elastic waist is integrated for comfort and a clean finish; adjustable suspenders. Full separating 2-way side zippers provide a drop-seat option without the need to remove suspenders, and allow easy removal over boots and crampons. Zippers are watertight and feature garages, including the zippers on the 2 external bib pockets. Articulated knees and gusseted crotch on the Arc'teryx Theta SV bib shell pants for women enhance mobility and comfort. Heavy-duty instep patches protect against damage by boots, crampons and ski edges. Cordura(R) powder cuffs with lace hooks fit easily over boots and secure into position; large pant-cuff diameter works well with alpine boots; hems have cord cinches. Arc'teryx expedition fit is cut slightly roomy to accommodate multiple layers without restricting movement; suitable for winter and extreme weather.
short_description: Arc'teryx Theta SV women's bib shell pants thrive and protect in harsh weather. They're crafted from robust GORE-TEX(R) Pro shell fabric for high-performance protection and durability.
